TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mkmatuy, title = Mkmatuy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mkmatuy} }

S.FORM: Mkmatuy Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Mkmatuy a niyaro', 163 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 452 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 85% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 384 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 15% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 68 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 82%, Bunun 1%, Saysiyat 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Mkmatoy Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Mkmatoy a niyaro', 163 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 452 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 85% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 384 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 15% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 68 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 82%, Bonon 1%, Saysiyat 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
